entry.source: They say that soaking your clothes in Femme{F801}{F804,5}Striges'{F804,0} blood gives you spiritual defenses.{F801}I want you to find {F804,5}{F878,1}{F804,0} {F804,5}{F872,1}{F804,0}s. I plan on{F801}making {F804,5}Devilsneak{F804,0} armor with these materials.{F801}I'll put them on sale when I'm done, so look{F801}forward to seeing them in my store!{F801}
